data.actual_result: The video is like, halfway fullscreened under the Discord window (observe GIF)
data.expected_result: It should properly fullscreen the video
data.short_description: Videos inside the mini activity tab modal is weirdly displayed if fullscreened
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user that plays a game which has a YouTube video or something in the news section - Play it and try to fullscreen it - Observe the weirdness
